Summary: Biochemical reaction from meperidine to meperidinic acid. This interaction is catalyzed by CES1.
Biochemical reaction from meperidine to normeperidine. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C19, CYP2B6 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from meperidinic acid to normeperidinic acid.
Biochemical reaction from normeperidine to normeperidinic acid.
